divs: Sighting DetailsI took a photo of the sky from my hotel room in Copacabana Beach in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. I am simply looking straight up. On my final day in Brazil I took this piture in the morning, the sky was perfectly blue, hence the reason for my picture. I have finally downloaded my pictures onto my computer and when reviewing them I see this in the picture. I did not see this in reality, only in the picture. It is unidentifiable and flying and some sort of object so I think qualifies as a UFO.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Rio de Janeiro
There were no other sightings in Rio de Janeiro on or around August 21st 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Unidentified object found in picture from trip
